actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to protect children from exposure to environmental tobacco smoke in the provision of children's services, and for other purposes.
short_title: Preventing Our Kids From Inhaling Deadly Smoke (PRO-KIDS) Act of 1992

summary.text: Preventing Our Kids From Inhaling Deadly Smoke (PRO-KIDS) Act of 1992 - Prohibits, notwithstanding any other provision of law, any Federal funds or financial assistance from being provided to or used by any person for services for children under five without an enforced policy prohibiting smoking in each portion of an indoor facility used for the services, with exceptions only for portions in which the services are not normally provided to children and that are ventilated separately. Allows waivers in certain circumstances.

titles.title: Preventing Our Kids From Inhaling Deadly Smoke (PRO-KIDS) Act of 1992
A bill to protect children from exposure to environmental tobacco smoke in the provision of children's services, and for other purposes.
